title: Having Trouble with the launcher
body: When i launch league of legends sometimes it plays up and i cant join my friends, there is no hex chest, and its acting like an old launcher (like the match history, profiles, and even the store)..... please help this is happening on a daily bases and its getting relay annoying

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
